DOC.brief_title: Low Tube Voltage Computed Tomographic ( CT ) Urography Using Low Concentration Iodine Contrast Agent

It need CT urography high contrast target lesion describe fill defect adjacent contrast fill urinary tract . For implementation high contra , conventional CT urography perform high voltage higher concentrated CT contrast another CT protocol . The high voltage result radiation exposure . DOC.criteria: Patients perform Computed Tomographic ( CT ) urography Patients without diminish renal function ( serum creatinine : 1.4 mg/dl & glomerular filtration rate : 34 mL/min/1.73 m2 ) patient operation and/or injury urinary system patient history anaphylaxis allergic reaction intravenous iodine contrast material
